label: clinical_signal_03_dx_renal_biomarker_study_005
content:

### Adverse Events
- AE ID: RB-AE-0549
  - Description: hyperkalemia
  - Grade: 1
  - Relatedness: unlikely related
  - Resolved: true
  - Cohort: 100mg
- AE ID: RB-AE-0541
  - Description: constipation
  - Grade: 1
  - Relatedness: not related
  - Resolved: true
  - Cohort: 50mg

### Protocol Deviations
- PD ID: RB-PD-0547
  - Description: Urine sample collection outside 24h window
  - Severity: minor

### Events
- Lab kit resupply dispatched to sites with low inventory
- Central lab urine biomarker batch analysis completed for Week 5
- Renal ultrasound images uploaded to central imaging core

### Notes
- Week 5: Renal biomarker collection on schedule. 70 subjects enrolled across 4 cohorts. eGFR and urinary biomarkers within expected variability.
